segments.text: I see the woman drying that plate like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just spilling everywhere, and she doesn’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy is practically hanging off that stool to reach the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, so patient, like she’s used to this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be in for a shock when she turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting more and more slippery by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the garden outside, so calm and perfect, while the kitchen is a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so sweet, just waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the water or the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR
